name: Frootful
description:
"Frootful" is a local resource-management PvP game. 2 players play against one another to try to grow the most fruitful tree! However, make sure that your tree is deeply enrooted so that the wind does not blow it over!

Made in 72 hours by: 

  • Paul Wetzel (Design and production)
  • Luna Corbee (Visual arts)
  • Seb van den Beemt (Visual arts) 
  • Martien Rurenga (Visual arts)
  • Martijn Hagenaars (Programming)
  • Kitty Scheres (Programming)
